formula: From _Bruno Berselli_, Sep 24 2010: (Start)G.f.: x*(3+7*x)/(1-x^3).a(n) - a(n-3) = 0 for n > 2.a(n) = A175833(n) - 4 = 4*(n-3*floor(n/3)) - (1 - (-1)^(n-3*floor((n+1)/3)))/2.a(n) = (31*(n mod 3) - 2*(n+1 mod 3) + (n+2 mod 3))/9 (cf. forms of modular arithmetic of Paolo P. Lava, i.e. see A146094). (End)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
